# Badge Generator - UP Le Renouveau

## Project Overview
A mobile-first web application for generating campaign badges for the UP – Le Renouveau political party.

## Features
- User enters name, first name, and uploads a photo
- Generates personalized badge with text "Moi [Nom Prénom], je maintiens le CAP"
- Displays party logo and colors
- Downloadable and shareable on WhatsApp and Facebook
- No backend required - pure frontend application

## Tech Stack
- HTML5
- CSS3 (Mobile-first responsive design)
- Vanilla JavaScript
- html2canvas (for image generation)

## Development Guidelines
- Keep the code simple and maintainable
- Prioritize mobile experience
- Use party colors: customize in CSS variables
- Ensure fast loading times

## Running the Project
- Open `index.html` in a browser or use Live Server extension
